pullRequest.title: [core] Deprecate DFA
pullRequest.bodyText:
Describe the PR
Deprecate DataflowAnomalyAnalysisRule, and all the DFA codebase. This includes what's in the PLSQL module (which I assume is ok, but can be reverted).
Related issues

Part of #2647 (the other part is about closing issues as "won't fix")

Ready?

 Added unit tests for fixed bug/feature
 Passing all unit tests
 Complete build ./mvnw clean verify passes (checked automatically by travis)
 Added (in-code) documentation (if needed)

nodes.bodyText: We can use here the rule tag as well, to make a link to the new rule. I'll change that when merging
